A duell betvveen a Iesuite and a Dominican, begun at Paris, gallantly fought at Madrid, and victoriously ended at London, upon fryday the 16 day of May, Anno Dom. 1651. / by Thomas Gage, alias the English American, now preacher of the word at Deal in Kent. Gage, Thomas, 1603?-1656.
8 p.
for Tho. Williams dwelling at the Bible in little Brittain, Printed at London : 1651.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

for Tho. Williams dwelling at the Bible in little Brittain, Printed at London : 1651.
